name: CatCat
description:
Controls

Keyboard : Space to read the intro, WASD or ↑↓←  → to move, space to jump
Controller : Y  to read the intro,  Joystick to move, Y to jump

2 cats, one white and one black, each occupying half of the screen.
White in a Black world and Black in a White world.
The goal is to go to the end of the level to make them kiss.

The theme of the jam is "Same but different".
We control the 2 cats at the same time with the same controls and they have the same models (same) but the colors are opposite and the obstacle are different (but different).

I only have two small levels right now, I plan to do more very soon.
